Surrounding the playing surface are white boards topped with clear panels. Several players are in motion across the ice, some wearing dark jerseys with red and white details and others in gold and black uniforms. A figure in a black and white striped jersey is also present. The players, equipped with hockey sticks, skate swiftly across the rink, maneuvering around a small black puck.**
